Savoury Sea Shell group was started in 1999. Now with more than 10 branches in South India and UAE we have had a steady growth and established ourselves as a leading Restaurant chain offering exquisite Arabian Savouries. 

What people love: 

Shawarma, Chicken Grill, Brownie, Jumbo Prawns, Chicken Chettinad, Chicken Butter Masala, Sea Food. 

Cuisines: 

Arabian, Chinese, North Indian, Biryani, Kerala, Salad, BBQ. 

Zomato Ratings - 4.0/5 
Swiggy Ratings - 4.4/5
